text:
MediaMiser http://http://www.mediamiser.com/ @ 11 Holland Avenue, Suite 715, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1Y 4S1

# Java Programmer [ONSITE]

Under the supervision of a senior software engineer, this position will participate in research and development of a media monitoring back-end. This position is required to participate on all aspects of harvesting big data streams, processing, analyzing and storing information in a distributed architecture (Hadoop) and delivering relevant documents to a web front-end with sub-second performance.

http://www.mediamiser.com/blog/job-postings/java-programmer/
